body:
## Steps to Reproduce the Problem
1. Run CVE scanners such as [grype](https://github.com/anchore/grype) or twistlock

```shell
$ grype temporalio/admin-tools:1.18.0
✔ Vulnerability DB        [no update available]
✔ Loaded image
✔ Parsed image
✔ Cataloged packages      [469 packages]
✔ Scanned image           [15 vulnerabilities]
[0008]  WARN some package(s) are missing CPEs. This may result in missing vulnerabilities. You may autogenerate these using: --add-cpes-if-none
NAME                        INSTALLED  FIXED-IN  TYPE       VULNERABILITY   SEVERITY
expat                       2.4.8-r0   2.4.9-r0  apk        CVE-2022-40674  Critical
```

## Specifications
* Version: v1.18.0
* Platform: admin-tools

## Note
`apk upgrade` will pull in the fixed package

comments.body:
FYI, 1.18.1 also suffers from same CVE

```
$ grype temporalio/admin-tools:1.18.1
 ✔ Vulnerability DB        [no update available]
 ✔ Pulled image
 ✔ Loaded image
 ✔ Parsed image
 ✔ Cataloged packages      [466 packages]
 ✔ Scanned image           [15 vulnerabilities]
[0013]  WARN some package(s) are missing CPEs. This may result in missing vulnerabilities. You may autogenerate these using: --add-cpes-if-none
NAME                        INSTALLED  FIXED-IN  TYPE       VULNERABILITY   SEVERITY
expat                       2.4.8-r0   2.4.9-r0  apk        CVE-2022-40674  Critical
```
`admin-tools` image requires a new server release.

title: CVE-2022-40674 reported in admin-tools v1.18.0 container
